Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Authorizes the town of Union Vale, county of Dutchess, to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parklands
Summary: Authorizes the town of Union Vale, county of Dutchess, to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parklands and to lease the lands to Homeland Towers, LLC for the placement and operation of a wireless communications tower.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize the town of Union Vale, county of Dutchess, to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parklands
